summary: The document comprises records associated with the Assassination Records Review Board, focusing on Robert J. Lehner's payroll records during his tenure with the Select Committee on Assassinations. It outlines his appointment as Deputy Chief Counsel, subsequent salary adjustments, and eventual termination. The records, part of the JFK Assassination Records Collection, include various forms and memoranda related to payroll and personnel actions, with certain details withheld for privacy reasons, notably Social Security numbers.
key_findings: Robert J. Lehner served as Deputy Chief Counsel for the Select Committee on Assassinations with an initial salary of $45,500.00.
The document includes several payroll authorization forms that record his salary adjustments and changes in position.
Release of some information was delayed to protect privacy, particularly concerning Social Security numbers.
This document is a component of the JFK Assassination Records Collection and underwent review by the Assassination Records Review Board.
